title: Brussels
description: Zooming in on the city, we can see a number of large parks, such as the Parc du Cinquantenaire or Jubelpark in the city’s European Quarter – home to the institutions of the European Union. Brussels is the de facto capital of the EU, and is a major centre for international politics.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
